summary: Kathleen Warner is a distinguished digital transformation leader currently serving as the COO of TechStars, where she aligns technological advancements with business strategies for global entrepreneurs. With a background in leadership roles at startups and non-profits, Kathleen excels in crafting innovative strategies and building high-performing teams that drive impactful digital transformations.
key_highlights: Serving as the COO of TechStars, focusing on digital transformation for global entrepreneurs.
Experience in leadership roles across both startups and non-profits.
Expertise in crafting innovative strategies and building high-performance teams.
